description: Business code that uniquely identifies an engine configuration (displacement/family/technology) used across the fleet and referenced by vehicle and specification records.
Human-readable engine description, typically detailing displacement, manufacturer/series, and key characteristics or technologies.
Username or system process that created the engine record.
Date and time the engine record was created.
Username or system process that last updated the engine record.
Date and time of the most recent update to the engine record.
